New Records: N’Golo Kante has two player-of-the-match awards already at Euro 2024
Key Match Events: Mbappé sustained a broken nose in France’s opening 1-0 win over Austria and didn’t come off the bench for the 0-0 draw with the Netherlands on Friday
Pre-Game Insights: Didier Deschamps sounded optimistic his star forward could play while wearing a face mask
France needs a point to guarantee a place in the round of 16 but probably has done enough already to advance
Post-Match Reflections: This could be his last-ever European Championship match for Robert Lewandowski
Szczęsny has already said he will be retiring from international soccer after these Euros
Miscellaneous Highlights: Poland has failed to advance from the group stage in four of its last five appearances at the European Championship
With 47 goals for France, Mbappé is four off tying with Thierry Henry in the list of all-time top scorers for the national team
